price: Ɔkaa sε: “Ampa sε mo ne mo agyanom (nyinaa) wͻ ͻyera pefee mu paa“.
arabic: قَالَ لَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُمۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla laqad kuntum antum waābāukum fī ḍalālin mubīnin
